name: Garlic Knots
description: 6 pieces of freshly baked dough knots, tossed in garlic butter and herbs. Served with a side of marinara.

name: Garlic Bread
description: Toasted Italian bread with a savory garlic butter spread. Served with a side of marinara for dipping.

name: Garlic Bread with Cheese
description: Toasted garlic bread topped with a generous layer of melted mozzarella cheese. Served with a side of marinara.

name: French Fries
description: A generous portion of golden, crispy french fries, lightly salted. The perfect side for any meal.

name: Mozzarella Sticks
description: 6 pieces of breaded mozzarella, fried to a golden crisp with a gooey, cheesy center. Served with a side of marinara.

name: Chicken Tenders
description: 4 pieces of juicy, all-white meat chicken tenders, breaded and fried until golden brown.

name: Side of Meatballs
description: Two large, homemade beef meatballs simmered in our signature marinara sauce.

name: Side of Sausage
description: Two links of sweet Italian sausage, grilled and served with a side of marinara sauce.

name: House Salad
description: A fresh mix of lettuce, tomatoes, onions, cucumbers, and black olives. Served with your choice of dressing.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with creamy Caesar dressing, crunchy croutons, and grated Parmesan cheese.

name: 6 Wings
description: Six jumbo Buffalo wings, fried crispy and tossed in your choice of sauce. Served with blue cheese or ranch.

name: 10 Wings
description: Ten jumbo Buffalo wings, fried crispy and tossed in your choice of sauce. Served with blue cheese or ranch.

name: 20 Wings
description: Twenty jumbo Buffalo wings, fried crispy and tossed in your choice of sauce. Served with blue cheese or ranch.

name: 50 Wings
description: Fifty jumbo Buffalo wings, fried crispy and tossed in your choice of sauce. Perfect for a crowd.

name: Cheese Calzone
description: A folded pizza dough stuffed with creamy ricotta and melted mozzarella cheese. Served with a side of marinara.

name: Stromboli
description: Rolled pizza dough filled with pepperoni, sausage, mushrooms, and mozzarella cheese. Served with a side of marinara.

name: Chicken Roll
description: Rolled dough filled with breaded chicken cutlet, marinara sauce, and mozzarella cheese. Served with a side of marinara.

name: Sausage Roll
description: Rolled dough filled with Italian sausage, sweet peppers, onions, and mozzarella cheese. Served with a side of marinara.

name: Ray's Special Pizza (18")
description: The works! A large pizza topped with pepperoni, sausage, meatballs, mushrooms, peppers, and onions.

name: Meat Lovers Pizza (18")
description: A carnivore's dream. A large pizza loaded with pepperoni, sausage, meatballs, and ham.

name: Veggie Lovers Pizza (18")
description: A large pizza piled high with fresh mushrooms, peppers, onions, and black olives.

name: White Pizza (18")
description: A sauceless large pizza with a delicious blend of creamy ricotta, mozzarella, and a hint of fresh garlic.

name: Margherita Pizza (18")
description: The Italian classic. A large pizza with our simple tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and aromatic basil.

name: Hawaiian Pizza (18")
description: A large pizza with a perfect sweet and savory combination of ham and pineapple.

name: Buffalo Chicken Pizza (18")
description: A large pizza topped with spicy buffalo chicken and creamy mozzarella, often with a swirl of ranch or blue cheese.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza (18")
description: A large pizza topped with tangy BBQ chicken, red onions, and mozzarella cheese.

name: Chicken Bacon Ranch Pizza (18")
description: A fan favorite! A large pizza with chicken cutlet, crispy bacon, mozzarella, and a creamy ranch dressing base.

name: Cheese Slice
description: A classic, foldable New York style slice with mozzarella cheese and tomato sauce.

name: Pepperoni Slice
description: A classic New York style cheese slice topped with savory, crispy pepperoni.

name: Gourmet Slice
description: A slice of one of our specialty gourmet pizzas, changing daily. Ask what's available!

name: Cheese Pizza (14")
description: A 14-inch medium pizza with our classic tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese. Perfect for sharing.

name: Cheese Pizza (18")
description: An 18-inch large pizza with our classic tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese. Perfect for the whole family.

name: Meatball Parmigiana
description: Hearty beef meatballs, marinara sauce, and melted mozzarella cheese on a toasted hero roll.

name: Chicken Parmigiana
description: A crispy breaded chicken cutlet, marinara sauce, and melted mozzarella cheese on a toasted hero roll.

name: Sausage Parmigiana
description: Sweet Italian sausage, marinara sauce, and melted mozzarella cheese on a toasted hero roll.

name: Eggplant Parmigiana
description: Tender, breaded eggplant slices, marinara sauce, and melted mozzarella cheese on a toasted hero roll.

name: Philly Cheesesteak
description: Thinly sliced steak with grilled onions, peppers, and melted provolone cheese on a hero roll.

name: Cannoli
description: A crispy pastry shell filled with a sweet, creamy ricotta filling and chocolate chips.

name: Tiramisu
description: A classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and creamy mascarpone, dusted with cocoa powder.

name: Cheesecake
description: A rich and creamy New York style cheesecake with a classic graham cracker crust.

name: Fountain Drink
description: Your choice of refreshing fountain soda (Coke, Diet Coke, Sprite, etc.).

name: 2-Liter Soda
description: A 2-liter bottle of your favorite soda, perfect for sharing with your pizza.
